User Navigation



  • 2004-11-13 12:47:39

    User Navigation

    Hi,
    In my Atutor copy, the links in user(student) navigation bar does not show the Nav-Icons.
    However it looks fine for insructor's nav-bar.

    Could you tell me how I can get the sudent's nav-bar to show the icons in front of the links.

    Thanks


  • 2004-11-13 14:28:45

    Icons preferences

    Display of icons is controlled with preference settings.

    See the documentation for this kind of information.
    http://atutor.ca/atutor/docs/howto.php
